contents.text: Tom wants to settle down and start a family , but his girlfriend Monica is not ready yet Therefore , they have to break up , Listen to the dialogue between Tom and his friend Jack .
contents.text_zh: 汤姆想安定下来建立个家庭，但是他的女朋友莫尼卡却还没有做好准备，因此，他们不得不分手。听下面这段来自汤姆和他的朋友杰克的对话。

contents.text: Hi Tom , how have you been ?
Why ? What happened ?  You look so down !
contents.text_zh: 怎么了？发生了什么事？你看起来闷闷不乐的。

contents.text: Come on . For a man who’s so down , there’re usually two reasons .Either his career is going downhill , or he has a broken heart .You’ re so successful , so apparently ...
contents.text_zh: 别这样嘛！令一个男人意志消沉只有两个原因，不是事业正在走下坡路、就是他有一颗破碎的心。你的工作这么成功，那么很显然...

contents.text: Well you’re right . I just broke up with Monica
contents.text_zh: 好了，你猜对了。我刚刚和莫尼卡分手了。

contents.text: Oh I’m sorry . I thought you two were made for each other .
contents.text_zh: 哦，对不起。我一直认为你们挺般配的呢。

contents.text: Well , you never know . I’m ready for a commitment and want to settle down , but she says she wants to pursue her career while she’s  still young .
contents.text_zh: 哎，你不会知道的。我已经为我们的承诺准备好了，我很想稳定下来，但她说她想趁年轻去追求自己的事业。

contents.text: Well , it’s always difficult to chose between career and family .
contents.text_zh: 哎，事业和家庭的确很难决择。

contents.text: om, I don’ t know what to say to comfort you , but cheer up !There’ s plenty of fish out there and you’ll find your perfect match !
contents.text_zh: 汤姆，我不知道该怎么安慰你才好，可你得振作啊！天涯何处无芳草，你定会找到最适合你的另一半。

contents.text: Yeah, but it’s hard to forget her at the moment.You know, we were together for almost five years. It’s really  hard...
contents.text_zh: 是的，但是我现在很难忘记她啊！你知道，我们在一起已经快5年了，我真的很难...
